name: space-coast-medical-business-template
title: Space Coast - Medical Business Template
desc: A modern medical and service business template with 100+ unique components / pages, powerful i18n capabilities, Keystatic CMS integration, and more.
article:
Space Coast is designed as a modern medical website template that also works great for other local service businesses.


  • Learn more about Space Coast
  • Unlock all existing and future production-ready templates by Cosmic Themes: https://cosmicthemes.com/all-access/

Key Features

General

  • 100+ unique components / pages
  • 100/100 Pagespeed, Accessibility, and Best Practices scores on Lighthouse
  • 3 custom landing pages to easily create customize your websites

Internationalization Capabilities

  • Easy configuration with "npm run config-i18n"
  • Route translations with wildcard support
  • Content collection localization capabilities through a frontmatter "mappingKey"
  • Text translations
  • Language switcher component

Services

  • Services content collection with Keystatic CMS support
  • Multiple services sections for landing and other pages
  • Individual services pages and a services index

Blog

  • Blog posts, and Authors content collections with Keystatic CMS support
  • Category support
  • Pagination for blog index and category pages
  • Multiple blog post layouts including table of contents
  • RSS feed

SEO

  • JsonLD schema for blog posts and other pages
  • Hreflang and other tags for multi-language websites
  • BaseLayout component you can pass a title, description, and optional image to for SEO purposes

Other

  • Legal pages with Keystatic CMS support
  • About page
  • 404 page
  • Prettier and ESLint pre-configured
  • Netlify deployment ready, with documentation for small Vercel or Cloudflare Pages adjustments
  • Custom scroll-based animations
  • Detailed documentation on features

Further Info

If you have any questions feel free to reach out at:

  • x.com/bowtiedwebreapr
  • creator@cosmicthemes.com

We also offer a bundle that includes all existing themes, all new themes that release, and all future updates. Read more atÂ Cosmic Themes All Access
